text: William Speakman-Pitt, VC (21 September 1927 â€“ 20 June 2018), known as Bill Speakman, was a British Army soldier and a recipient of the Victoria Cross. He was the first person to receive an honor from Queen Elizabeth II.Our Queen at Ninety. ITV, 28 March 2016 Speakman died on 20 June 2018, aged 90. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:British military people category:People from Cheshire
